location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 55 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shiraz to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter concerns the supposed rejection of a gift from the Resident by Hadgee Zarat Khan. It explains that he is claiming that his opinion of the gift was misrepresented by Meerza Ali Ackbar; it notes that the Resident is not convinced by this claim, and instead believes that he regrets giving up the gift in question.
